title: The Squirm Files: Squirm, Strum, The Well-hung Gun
description: No virgins or tentacles were harmed in the making of this anthology. Batteries not included.A squidalicious collection of the 3 books from The Squirm Squirm, Strum, and The Well-hung Gun. These are parodies of erotic romance, tentacle erotica, purple prose, and the tropes of romance.This anthology should not be read, glimpsed, or sat on by anyone who thinks procreation is only to be attempted while fully dressed and with the lights off, so you can't see the naughty bits.
author: Cari Silverwood
